quest.name: Beastly Bandits
journal: Leaning Ent wishes his friend was a faster runner.

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: Please, you've got to help my friend!

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: We were minding our own business, carrying some fertilizer, when we got attacked by a group of Qiqirn. I managed to escape, but my friend was not so lucky.

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: Those rat bastards have doubtless got him tied up in the Carmine Kitchen. I beg you, save him!

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: Those rat bastards have doubtless got my friend tied up in the Carmine Kitchen. I beg you, save him!

dialogue.name: FEARVILLAGER02649
dialogue.text: I don't even want to imagine what would have happened had you not come.

dialogue.name: FEARVILLAGER02649
dialogue.text: In fact, I can't take being here much longer. I'm going to head back to the village. Thanks once again!

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: I just saw my friend a short while ago. Not a scratch on him!

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: The Empire don't consider Qiqirn to be bandits. They treat them as they would any other beast. This means when we ask for help ridding the area of robbers, they tell us it's our responsibility to take care of pests.

dialogue.name: LEANINGENT
dialogue.text: But that's enough complaining. Thank you for saving my friend from being devoured by those rats.
